file_insights.description: Comprehensive settings management for CloudOpsTools application

patterns_discovered: Using Pydantic for type-safe configuration management
Flexible credential handling for multiple AWS environments
Integrated security and feature flag mechanisms
gotchas_discovered: Hardcoded secret key with explicit warning to change in production
Potential circular import risk with feature flags import
Multiple ways of specifying database connection URL

changes_made: Set DATABASE_URL to sqlite database path

recommendations: Replace hardcoded SECRET_KEY with secure generation method
Consider extracting AWS credential management to separate module
Add more robust error handling in _apply_phase1_security_fixes method
Implement comprehensive logging for security-related operations
